page.title: 07FIREX 85 ( PART TWO )
page.content:
11) Demonstrations of how fires were tackled over the ages. Ranging from modern American and English engines rescuing kissagram girls from tall blazing buildings, to engines pulled by shire horses putting out burning barns. 12) Traction engines on display. 13) Minature steam train rides. 14) A dog show, and gymkana - where unfortunately one young girl was thrown from a horse and ended the day in hospital with a broken leg.
There were a number of other things including many of the popular beer tents! One fireman recently received a medal for his work. As an added reward after rescuing the kissagram girls they each kissed him then took his trousers off. It made great day out.
